results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has arrived.
results.Name: Arrival, completed

results.Description: Authorisation to load has been given.
results.Name: Loading, authorized

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment or a means of transport has arrived in a defective condition.
results.Name: Arrival, in defective condition

results.Description: The equipment previously the subject of a 'defective condition' status has been returned to service.
results.Name: Defective equipment returned to service

results.Description: The process has begun.
results.Name: Process, begun

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment or means of transport has been booked.
results.Name: Booking, completed

results.Description: The booking of goods/consignment/equipment or means of transport has been cancelled.
results.Name: Booking, cancelled

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport held for import restriction purposes has been released for import.
results.Name: Cleared, import restrictions

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport held for export restriction purposes has been released for export.
results.Name: Cleared, export restrictions

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been cleared by agriculture food or fisheries authorities.
results.Name: Cleared, by agriculture, food or fisheries authorities

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been cleared by port authority.
results.Name: Cleared, by port authority

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been cleared by customs.
results.Name: Cleared, by customs

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been collected/picked-up.
results.Name: Collection/pick-up, completed

results.Description: The process has been completed.
results.Name: Process, completed

results.Description: The goods/consignments have been consolidated.
results.Name: Consolidated

results.Description: The goods/consignments/equipment/means of transport has crossed a border.
results.Name: Crossed border

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been refused to be cleared by the customs authorities.
results.Name: Customs clearance, refused

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment has been damaged in the course of transportation.
results.Name: Damaged in the course of transportation

results.Description: Damaged equipment has been assessed and a repair quotation has been sent.
results.Name: Equipment, damage quoted for

results.Description: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been delayed in the course of transportation.
results.Name: Delayed, in the course of transportation
